title: Randi Rhodes Show - October 04 2013
description:

Storms are bearing down on the US, as government meteorologists have been sent home due to the shutdown. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s like a perfect storm of Republican stupidity.
The lack of meteorologists is no problem to the Republican base. They just think Ã¢â‚¬Å“Meteorologists? Hell, we ainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t gonna get hit by no meteors.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

Along with shutting down the government, I think the Republicans have shut down whatever brains they had left. With that in mind, they should probably shut their mouths down too. Alex Jones was calling the car chase/shooting death incident in DC a Ã¢â‚¬Å“false flagÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ operation even while it was still ongoing! Everything is a false flag to Alex. Does he even think that real flags exist?

Glenn Beck says that ObamaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s next move after shutting down the national monuments is going to be mass killings of millions of people. Then maybe the House Republicans should pass a CR. It will foil ObamaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s diabolical plot and save millions of lives.

Republican Congressman Todd Rokita was having a back and forth with CNN anchor Carol Costello when he suddenly seemed to want to make it into a whole another kind of back and forth. Rokita said Ã¢â‚¬Å“Carol, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re beautiful but you need to be honest as well.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve heard of Republican talking points.
